<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lifeblood's Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=2422) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 51 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The impulse to survive and continue fighting resonates deep within you. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage rolls on your melee Strikes equal to twice the sum of your [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) and [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) conditions (to a maximum of a +8 circumstance bonus to damage) whenever you have one or both conditions.
name: Lifeblood's Call
